actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the standard mileage rate deduction for charitable use of passenger automobiles.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the standard mileage rate deduction for charitable use of a passenger automobile. Provides that the Secretary must adjust such standard mileage rate consistent with an adjustment to the business standard mileage rate for any period after 1993.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the standard mileage rate deduction for charitable use of passenger automobiles.
